snippet: The newest phone from HTC on the Sprint network will have the words "4G LTE" in its name - even though Sprint hasn't finished building a 4G LTE network yet.
abstract: The newest phone from HTC on the Sprint network will have the words "4G LTE" in its name - even though Sprint hasn't finished building a 4G LTE network yet.

headline.main: Will Sprint's Network Catch Up With Its 4G LTE Phone?
headline.print_headline: Sprint’s Network Hasn’t Caught Up To Its Phones
